name: Blood and Snow
description:
Blood and Snow is a top down survival game set during a snow storm. The storm will be over in seven days. Your task is to chop trees and hunt deer to keep you and Emily alive. However, you can't stay outside for too long, because the cold will freeze you to death.

Controls
  • Move using WASD and sprint with Shift
  • Switch weapon with Q
  • Shoot/Interact with the Left Mouse Button
  • Collect with E (or by clicking with LMB)
  • Zoom the camera with the scroll wheel
  • Rebind keys in the controlsmenu
Tips
  • Go inside the cabin to warm up, drop off supplies and restock on ammo.
  • Chop trees by clicking on them (with the rifle unequipped).
  • Carrying a lot of supplies will slow you down.
  • The compass in the top right points towards the cabin.
  • Follow the footstep to find the deer.
  • The deer are incredibly stupid, because I spent too much time on the dynamically growing forest.
Theme

This game was made for Ludum Dare 46. The theme was "Keep it alive". In this case, you have to keep Emily alive (the woman in the cabin). I first wanted to go for some kind of monster that you had to bring to some place, but this was hard because of the freezing mechanic I wanted to implemented. Though, Emily is pretty nice as well.

Total development time: 25 hours [jam] + 4 hours [post-jam]
